body.p: social shoppingSocial shopping involves researching reviews and community member recommendations before or while making a purchase. To encourage and participate in social shopping, you could read a book that is related to the types of problems your customers solve with your product, then go to amazon.com and write a book review for a book related to your product or expertise that your company provides. Or, you could perform a search on amazon.com using keywords that are helpful to your users to get a sense of who else is reading and reviewing those books and what problems theyâ€™re solving.
